ITL101.name: Elementary Italian I
ITL101.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
ITL101.description: Practice in using and understanding Italian to develop listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills. Pronunciation, grammar, vocabulary, and cultural topics.

ITL102.name: Elementary Italian II
ITL102.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
ITL102.description: Further practice in using and understanding Italian to develop listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills. Pronunciation, grammar, vocabulary, and cultural topics.

ITL201.name: Second-Year Italian I
ITL201.description: Intermediate-level review and development of aural comprehension, speaking, reading, and writing skills. Topics in Italian culture.

ITL202.name: Second-Year Italian II
ITL202.description: Further review and development of aural comprehension, speaking, reading, and writing skills. Topics in Italian culture.

ITL290.name: Independent Study
ITL290.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
ITL290.description: Special projects arranged by an individual student and a faculty member in areas supplementing regular course offerings.

ITL320.name: Advanced Grammar and Composition
ITL320.description: Composition in a variety of styles and modes. Review of grammar. Extensive practice in writing.

ITL330.name: Italian Culture and Civilization
ITL330.description: Diverse aspects of political, social, economic, intellectual, artistic, and literary life of Italy. Class discussion in Italian of readings, films, television programs, and musical selections.

ITL350.name: Introduction to Italian Literature
ITL350.description: Italian literature from its origins to the present. Reading and discussion in Italian of representative works from all genres.
ITL350.prerequisite: (ITL 320) and completion of Tier I writing requirement

ITL355.name: Italian Literature in English Translation
ITL355.description: Representative works and themes of Italian literature.
ITL355.restrictions: Not open to freshmen. Approval of department.

ITL400.name: Reading Italian
ITL400.description: Intensive study of Italian for students in need of reading knowledge of the language for their disciplines.
ITL400.restrictions: Open to graduate students or approval of department.

ITL490.name: Independent Study
ITL490.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
ITL490.description: Special projects arranged by an individual student and a faculty member in areas supplementing regular course offerings.
ITL490.restrictions: Not open to sophomores or freshmen. Approval of department.

ITL800.name: Reading Italian
ITL800.description: Intensive study of Italian for students in need of reading knowledge of the language for their disciplines. Focus on reading comprehension and translation into English.
ITL800.restrictions: Not open to freshmen and not open to sophomores or approval of department.
